h3.style: font-size: 20px; border-top: 4px solid rgb(195, 26, 31); font-family: latobold; text-transform: uppercase; color: rgb(77, 77, 77); background: rgb(236, 236, 236); padding: 9px 15px; margin: 0px 0px 20px;

div.span: The Board of Education shall provide equal and bias-free access for all students to all school facilities, courses, programs and services, regardless of race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, age, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, religion, disability or socioeconomic status.

No qualified handicapped or disabled person shall, on the basis of handicap or disability, be excluded from participation in, be denied the benefits of, or be subjected to discrimination in activity or vocational opportunities sponsored by the Board of Education.

Title IX Coordinator:
Michael Nicholson, 856-694-0100, Ext. 241

Section 504 Compliance Officer:
Jackie Scerbo, 856-694-0100, Ext. 243
Equity in Education Programs and Services (5755)
Affirmative Action Programs for School and Classroom Practice (2260, 2260R)

Bilingual and ESL Education (2423, 2423R)
High School HIB Score: 73
Middle School HIB Score: 69
District HIB Score: 71

h3.style: font-size: 20px; border-top: 4px solid rgb(195, 26, 31); font-family: latobold; text-transform: uppercase; color: rgb(77, 77, 77); background: rgb(236, 236, 236); padding: 9px 15px; margin: 0px 0px 20px;

p.span: The Delsea Regional High School District is a collaborative learning community that is passionately committed to educating all students; our mission is to develop life-long learners who demonstrate character and become valuable members of our community, country, and world.

div.div: 242 Fries Mill Road, Franklinville, NJ 08322 | Phone 856-694-0100 | Fax 856-694-4417
